Method: POST
URL: https://www.notion.so/api/v3/loadPageChunk
Body:+152

  "limit": 50,

    "stack": []

          "parent_id": "fb5ccd76-11d5-43b4-a4fe-ff19ca5f8d5e",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["The problem with using "],
              ["bind_result", [["c"]]],
              [
                " is that it requires the statement to specify the columns that will be used. This means that for the above to work the query must have looked like this "
              ],
              ["SELECT forename FROM users", [["c"]]],
              [
                ". To include more columns simply add them as parameters to the "
              ],
              ["bind_result", [["c"]]],
              [" function (and ensure that you add them to the SQL query)."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 5
        }

          "last_edited_time": 1552023054159,
          "parent_id": "fb5ccd76-11d5-43b4-a4fe-ff19ca5f8d5e",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              [
                "The drawback to this is that you have to assign a lot of variables at once. This makes keeping track of large queries difficult. If you have "
              ],
              [
                "MySQL Native Driver (",
                [["a", "http://php.net/manual/en/book.mysqlnd.php"]]
              ],
              [
                "mysqlnd",
                [["c"], ["a", "http://php.net/manual/en/book.mysqlnd.php"]]
              ],
              [")", [["a", "http://php.net/manual/en/book.mysqlnd.php"]]],
              [" installed, all you need to do is use "],
              [
                "get_result",
                [["a", "http://php.net/manual/en/mysqli-stmt.get-result.php"]]
              ],
              ["."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "function get_result(\\mysqli_stmt $statement)\n{\n    $result = array();\n    $statement->store_result();\n    for ($i = 0; $i < $statement->num_rows; $i++)\n    {\n        $metadata = $statement->result_metadata();\n        $params = array();\n        while ($field = $metadata->fetch_field())\n        {\n            $params[] = &$result[$i][$field->name];\n        }\n        call_user_func_array(array($statement, 'bind_result'), $params);\n        $statement->fetch();\n    }\n    return $result;\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
